column12: Improvements introduced in advance devices for chain conveyor and packing expulsor (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: Improvements introduced in advance devices for chain conveyor and ejector containers, essentially characterized by being constituted by a conveyor belt, composed of a series of carrier plates that is dragged by a gear wheels mounted on an axis, which is coupled a device anti-reverse, which is fixed gear. This gear is driven by a hydraulic or pneumatic piston, through a rack. Attached to the shaft are some ejectors of containers coinciding with the cavities of the slats and in which the containers are housed. The shaft has a built-in brake to control the inertia of the belt. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
